summary.span: 定义用于绘制直线和曲线的对象。

span.span: Defines an object used to draw lines and curves.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制指定宽度和样式的线条。A draws a line of specified width and style. 使用属性可绘制多种虚线。Use the property to draw several varieties of dashed lines. 绘制的线条可以使用各种填充样式（包括纯色和纹理）进行填充。The line drawn by a can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures. 填充样式取决于用作填充对象的画笔或纹理。The fill style depends on brush or texture that is used as the fill object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和在上设置属性的效果来构造。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a and the effects of setting the property on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowLineJoin`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定绘制线条的方式。 The property determines how the draws lines. 线条的绘制方式与填充的矩形相同，并具有指定的特征。Lines are drawn as if they are filled rectangles, with the characteristics of the specified . 新 的属性设置为1（默认值）。The property of the new is set to 1 (the default). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和在上设置属性的效果来构造。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a and the effects of setting the property on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowLineJoin`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks `brush` `width`设置为参数中指定的颜色，属性设置为参数中指定的值，单位设置为 。 The is set to the color specified in the `brush` parameter, the property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter, and the units are set to . 请注意， `brush`参数还指定此的属性。Note that the `brush` parameter also specifies the property of this . 如果为0，则将导致绘图的宽度为1。 `width`A `width` of 0 will result in the drawing as if the width were 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，并演示在上 设置和属性的效果。The following code example creates a and demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowStartAndEndCaps`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowStartAndEndCaps` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`color`参数所指定的颜色。 The property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter. 此属性设置为`width`参数中指定的值。The property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter. 如果为0，则将导致绘图的宽度为1。 `width`A `width` of 0 will result in the drawing as if the width were 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和设置、 和属性的效果。The following code example demonstrates creating a and the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`在处理窗体事件时调用方法，并将e 作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing e as . summary.span: 获取或设置此 的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment for this .

value.span: 表示该 的对齐方式的 。

span.span: A that represents the alignment for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定绘制闭合曲线和多边形的方式。This property determines how the draws closed curves and polygons. 枚举指定5个值; 但是，只有两个值会改变绘制线条的外观。 The enumeration specifies five values; however, only two values - and - will change the appearance of a drawn line. 此属性的默认值，它指定笔的宽度在曲线或多边形的轮廓上居中。 is the default value for this property and specifies that the width of the pen is centered on the outline of the curve or polygon. 此属性的值指定笔的宽度位于曲线或多边形的轮廓内。A value of for this property specifies that the width of the pen is inside the outline of the curve or polygon. 其他三个值（ 、 和）将生成居中的笔。The other three values, , , and , will result in a pen that is centered. 如果将其对齐方式设置为 ，则会产生不可靠的结果，有时会在插入位置绘制，有时在居中位置。 A that has its alignment set to will yield unreliable results, sometimes drawing in the inset position and sometimes in the centered position. 此外，不能使用嵌入笔绘制复合线条，也不能用虚线帽绘制虚线。Also, an inset pen cannot be used to draw compound lines and cannot draw dashed lines with dash caps.

exception.span: 指定值不是 的成员。

span.span: The specified value is not a member of .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e`作为事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 创建该笔的副本。Creates a copy of that pen. - 使用笔的副本在屏幕上绘制线条。Draws a line to the screen, using the copy of the pen. MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ CompoundArray { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };
member this.CompoundArray : single[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定复合钢笔的值数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values that specifies a compound pen.

summary.span: 复合钢笔绘制由平行直线和空白区域组成的复合直线。

span.span: A compound pen draws a compound line made up of parallel lines and spaces.

value.span: 用于指定复合数组的实数组。

span.span: An array of real numbers that specifies the compound array.

value.span: 该数组中的元素必须按升序排列，不能小于 0，也不能大于 1。

span.span: The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复合行由不同宽度的交替行和空格组成。A compound line is made up of alternating parallel lines and spaces of varying widths. 数组中的值指定复合行的每个组件相对于钢笔宽度的起点。The values in the array specify the starting points of each component of the compound line relative to the pen's width. 数组中的第一个值指定第一个分量（行）从钢笔宽度的一小部分开始。The first value in the array specifies where the first component (a line) begins as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen. 数组中的第二个值将下一个组件（空格）的开始指定为笔宽度的一小部分。The second value in the array specifies the beginning of the next component (a space) as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen. 数组中的最后一个值指定最后一个组件的结束位置。The final value in the array specifies where the last component ends. 假设您想要一笔绘制两条平行线，其中第一行的宽度是笔宽度的 20%，分隔这两行的空间的宽度是笔宽度的 50%，第二行的宽度是笔的宽度的 30%宽度。Suppose you want a pen to draw two parallel lines where the width of the first line is 20 percent of the pen's width, the width of the space that separates the two lines is 50 percent of the pen' s width, and the width of the second line is 30 percent of the pen's width. 首先，创建一个和一个实数数组。Start by creating a and an array of real numbers. 通过将值为0.0、0.2、0.7 和1.0 的数组传递到此属性来设置复合数组。Set the compound array by passing the array with the values 0.0, 0.2, 0.7, and 1.0 to this property. 如果将其属性设置为，则不要设置此属性。Do not set this property if the has its property set to .

exception.span: 对不可变的 （比如由 类所返回）设置 属性。

span.span: The property is set on an immutable , such as those returned by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性的 属性设置为，则不要将此属性设置为。Do not set this property to if the has its property set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和设置、 和属性的效果。The following code example demonstrates creating a and the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . summary.span: 获取或设置自定义的短划线和空白区域的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of custom dashes and spaces.

value.span: 实数数组，指定虚线中交替出现的短划线和空白区域的长度。

span.span: An array of real numbers that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and spaces in dashed lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`null`为此属性指定的值不是，则会将此的属性设置为。Assigning a value other than `null` to this property will set the property for this to . `dashArray`数组中的元素设置破折号模式中每个短划线和空间的长度。The elements in the `dashArray` array set the length of each dash and space in the dash pattern. 第一个元素设置短划线的长度，第二个元素设置空格的长度，第三个元素设置短划线的长度，依此类推。The first element sets the length of a dash, the second element sets the length of a space, the third element sets the length of a dash, and so on. 因此，每个元素应为非零正数。Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number. 破折号模式中每个短划线和空间的长度是数组中元素值和的宽度的乘积。The length of each dash and space in the dash pattern is the product of the element value in the array and the width of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示设置、 和属性的效果。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值为，则指定由属性定义的虚线和空格的自定义模式构成使用此绘制的直线。A value of for this property specifies that a custom pattern of dashes and spaces, defined by the property, makes up lines drawn with this . 如果此属性的值为 ，并且属性的值为`null`，则笔绘制实线。If the value of this property is and the value of the property is `null`, the pen draws solid lines.

summary.span: 释放此 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用会允许出于其他目的重新分配此所使用的资源。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后，必须释放对的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了设置和属性的效果，并演示了如何调用的方法。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties, and shows how to call the method for a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowLineJoin`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin LineJoin { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin value); };
member this.LineJoin : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置通过此 绘制的两条连续直线的端点的联接样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this .

value.span: 一个 ，表示通过此 绘制的两条连续直线的端点的联接样式。

span.span: A that represents the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行联接是由两行构成的通用区域，它们的结束时间都达到或重叠。A line join is the common area that is formed by two lines whose ends meet or overlap. 有三个线条联接样式：斜接、凹凸和圆形。There are three line join styles: miter, bevel, and round. 为对象指定线条联接样式时，该联接样式将应用于使用该钢笔绘制的任何对象中的所有连接行。下图显示了斜切行联接示例的结果。When you specify a line join style for a object, that join style will be applied to all the connected lines in any object drawn using that pen.The following illustration shows the results of the beveled line join example. ![笔](~/add/media/pens5.gif "笔")![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens") ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在上 设置和属性的影响。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowLineJoin`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 对不可变的 （比如由 类所返回）设置 属性。

span.span: The property is set on an immutable , such as those returned by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MiterLimit { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.MiterLimit : single with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置斜接角上联接宽度的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.

value.span: 斜接角上联接宽度的限制。

span.span: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接长度是从联接内的直线壁与联接外线条壁的交点之间的距离。The miter length is the distance from the intersection of the line walls on the inside of the join to the intersection of the line walls outside of the join. 如果两条线之间的角度很小，则斜接长度可能会很大。The miter length can be large when the angle between two lines is small. 斜接限制是最大允许的斜接长度与笔划宽度之间的比值。The miter limit is the maximum allowed ratio of miter length to stroke width. 默认值为 10.0 f。The default value is 10.0f. 如果交集联接的斜接长度超出联接的限制，则联接将会被斜切，使其保持在交集联接的限制范围内。If the miter length of the join of the intersection exceeds the limit of the join, then the join will be beveled to keep it within the limit of the join of the intersection.

exception.span: 对不可变的 （比如由 类所返回）设置 属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将`matrix`参数中指定的乘法矩阵前面预置到乘法运算的变换矩阵。This method prepends the multiplication matrix specified in the `matrix` parameter to the transformation matrix for the multiplication operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e`作为事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 在屏幕上绘制线条。Draws a line to the screen. - 将笔的变换矩阵与指定的矩阵相乘。Multiplies the transformation matrix of the pen by the specified matrix. - 使用转换后的笔绘制一条直线。Draws a line with the transformed pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e`作为事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 将笔的变换矩阵设置为 x 轴方向的2倍。Sets the transformation matrix of the pen to scale 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 在屏幕上绘制线条。Draws a line to the screen. - 将变换矩阵重置为标识。Resets the transformation matrix to identity. - 在屏幕上绘制第二行。Draws a second line to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 此方法将旋转添加到转换前。

span.span: This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为笔的形状是圆形的，所以旋转不会有任何明显的效果，除非笔在 x 轴或 y 轴方向缩放。Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e`作为事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 使用笔绘制矩形。Draws a rectangle using the pen. - 在 x 轴方向上将笔按2次缩放。Scales the pen by 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 将笔顺时针旋转90度。Rotates the pen 90 degrees clockwise. - 绘制第二个矩形以演示差异。Draws a second rectangle to demonstrate the difference. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为笔的形状是圆形的，所以旋转不会有任何明显的效果，除非笔在 x 轴或 y 轴方向缩放。Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e`作为事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 在 x 轴方向上将笔按2次缩放。Scales the pen by 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 使用笔绘制矩形。Draws a rectangle using the pen. - 将笔顺时针旋转90度。Rotates the pen 90 degrees clockwise. - 绘制第二个矩形以演示差异。Draws a second rectangle to demonstrate the difference. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e`作为事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码将创建一个，并将其设置为在行首绘制箭头定位点帽：The code creates a and sets it to draw arrow anchor caps at the beginning of lines: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在上 设置和属性的影响。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowStartAndEndCaps`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowStartAndEndCaps` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . summary.span: 获取或设置此 的几何变换的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric transformation for this .

value.span: 一个 副本，表示此 的几何转换。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义笔尖的椭圆形形状。This property defines an elliptical shape for the pen tip. 此椭圆通过应用变换矩阵从默认循环获得。This ellipse is obtained from the default circular shape by applying the transformation matrix. 请注意，将忽略矩阵的翻译部分。Note that the translation portion of the matrix is ignored. 由于由属性返回的矩阵是笔的几何转换的副本，因此，当您不再需要矩阵时，您应该释放它。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the pen's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 使用对象的属性访问该对象的度量单位。You can access the unit of measure of the object using its property. 度量单位通常是像素。The unit of measure is typically pixels. 如果为0， 则将导致绘图，就像是1。 A of 0 will result in the drawing as if the were 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在上 设置和属性的影响。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并`ShowLineJoin`在处理窗体事件时调用方法， `e`并将作为传递。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
